add_aim(guide)[source]¶

Create a new child aim relationship between self and guide. Guide is considered to be the child of self. Any constraint and attribute updates are added to self, as well as the connector.

add_child(guide)[source]¶

Add guide to children

children[source]¶

self has guide as a child self has constraint self –> guide

self is always parent guide is always child
